data.comment: The match is underway in Recife.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 1, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 3, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 5, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Recife PE.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 8, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 12, In Recife, Martin Benitez of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Vasco da Gama's German Cano attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In the minute 13, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama are pushing forward but Leo Matos's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
In the minute 15, In Recife a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 18, Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Recife PE's Leandro Barcia is on target but unsuccessful.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 22, Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Marcio Araujo fires in a strike for Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Recife PE drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 25, Vasco da Gama attack but Neto Borges's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through German Cano.
In the minute 26, Great play from Leonardo Gil to set up the goal.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 29, Throw-in Recife PE.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 31, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE just outside Vasco da Gama's area.
Recife PE's Lucas Mugni misses with an attempt on goal.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 33, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Recife PE's half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 35, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes waits before resuming play because Leonardo Gil for Vasco da Gama is still down.
Leonardo Gil is back on his feet again.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 42, Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Recife PE have an attacking throw-in.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Can Recife PE capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Recife.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 45, Heber Roberto Lopes awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Recife PE's Thiago Neves has run offside.
Leo Matos for Vasco da Gama drives towards goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Vasco da Gama are coming forward and Talles Magno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Recife.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at Ilha do Retiro.
The home team have replaced Jonathan Gomez with Mikael. This is the first substitution made today by Daniel Paulista.
In the minute 47, Recife PE to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
Goal! German Cano extends Vasco da Gama's lead to 0-2.
Neto Borges with an assist there.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 57, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE's Leandro Barcia gets in a shot on goal at Ilha do Retiro. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 62, Marquinhos is replacing Ricardinho for the home team.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
In the minute 64, Marquinhos of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Vasco da Gama make their first substitution with Yago Pikachu replacing Martin Benitez.
In the minute 65, Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Werley, who is grimacing with pain.
Recife PE push forward at Ilha do Retiro and Marcio Araujo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vasco da Gama defence.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 68, Vasco da Gama's Yago Pikachu misses with an attempt on goal.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Gustavo Torres replacing Talles Magno.
In the minute 69, The away team has substituted Werley with Jadson. Ricardo Sa Pinto is thus making his third change.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a throw-in for Recife PE, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
In the minute 72, Recife PE's Lucas Mugni gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
Vasco da Gama push forward at Ilha do Retiro and German Cano gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vasco da Gama close to the penalty box.
The home team replace Marcio Araujo with Junior Tavares.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Heber Roberto Lopes.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Tiago Reis is replacing German Cano for Vasco da Gama at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Ricardo Sa Pinto is making the team's fifth substitution at Ilha do Retiro with Vinicius replacing Leo Matos.
Hernane Brocador is replacing Thiago Neves for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
In the minute 81, Throw-in high up the field for Recife PE in Recife.
Can Recife PE capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, Vasco da Gama pushes forward through Andrey, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Vasco da Gama's Tiago Reis gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
In the minute 84, Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Vasco da Gama will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Recife PE.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Recife PE drives forward and Iago Maidana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 88, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Recife PE.
Vasco da Gama drive upfield and Tiago Reis gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Ilha do Retiro.
Free kick Recife PE.
Recife PE are coming forward and Adryelson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 7 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Recife a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Heber Roberto Lopes awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Recife PE.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a Recife PE throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Heber Roberto Lopes signals a free kick to Recife PE.
The match is over. Final score 0-2.
Vasco da Gama's Tiago Reis has been booked in Recife.
Andrey (Vasco da Gama) gets a yellow card.
